en.log_ene_gulud_ugdun: Our scout discovered where orcs keep children in captivity! Ugdun's castle must fall!
en.log_ene_haunted_library: Our scout discovered an haunted library, will we be able to get knowledge from it?
en.log_ene_hobgoblin_chieftain: Our scout discovered an Hobgoblin chieftain together with his small army
en.log_ene_hobgoblin_encampment: Our scout discovered an encampment full of Hobgoblin grunts
en.log_ene_hydra_pit: Our scout discovered the grave of one of the legendary monsters the five-headed Hydra
en.log_ene_huge_cave: Our scout discovered what lies under the Library of SouLs: a huge cavern filled with undead!
en.log_ene_immense_door_e: We have discovered an immense door buried under shifting sands
en.log_ene_lich_temple: Our scout found where the necromancer came from, the temple of a Lich
en.log_ene_leprechaun_den: Our scout found a den of a Leprechaun, it will store gold and luck!
en.log_ene_lost_valley: Our scout discovered a lost valley, beware the beasts!
en.log_ene_kobold_city: Our scout discovered a city full of Kobolds. Will it be part of a larger nation?
en.log_ene_kobold_looters: Our scout discovered a small band of Kobold looters
en.log_ene_kobold_stash: Our scout discovered a kobold stash
en.log_ene_kobold_underground_tunnels: Our scout discovered an underground tunnel maze full of Kobolds, let's try to drive them off
en.log_ene_korrigan_dolmen: Our scout discovered a circle of dolmen, the korrigans guard it
en.log_ene_naga_nest: Our scout discovered a naga nest. In the distance you can hear the cries of animals that are kept as a food supply
en.log_ene_nasty_pillagers: Our scout discover a small group of pillagers around our village, let's drive them off
en.log_ene_necromancer_crypt: Our scout discovered the house of a Necromancer, the place is haunted by ghouls and ghasts
en.log_ene_necropolis: Our scout found a Necropolis in the Abyss
en.log_ene_north_sacred_place: Our scout discovered the north sacred place!
en.log_ene_markanat_forest: Our scout follows the myth of Markanat and discovers his forest. Beware the huge spider!
en.log_ene_mercenary_camp: Our scout discovered a mercenary encampment, from a distance you can see that they do not fly the flag of some kingdom and probably are dedicated to looting
en.log_ene_minotaur_maze: Our scout discovered the maze of the legendary monsters the Minotaur
en.log_ene_mountain_cave: Our scout discovered a huge cave in a mountain, maybe it's the lair of a giant
en.log_ene_mountain_valley: Our scout discovered a beautiful valley in the middle of the mountains. The giants have made it their home
en.log_ene_myconid_cavern: Our scout discovered a cavern filled up with a tribe of myconids
en.log_ene_old_herd: Our scout discovered an old herd
en.log_ene_old_outpost: Our scout discovered the outpost Galliard talk about. Let's free it!
en.log_ene_old_storage_room: Our scout discovered an old storage room with a nest of spiders
en.log_ene_orc_gormiak_citadel: Our scout discovered the orcish citadel, now they will know human vengeance
en.log_ene_orc_horith_citadel: Our scout discovered the orcish citadel of Horith
en.log_ene_orc_ogsog_citadel: Our scout discovered the orcish citadel of Ogsog
en.log_ene_orc_turgon_citadel: Our scout discovered the orcish citadel of Turgon
en.log_ene_orc_raiding_party: Our scout discovered an orcish army that is plundering our lands!
en.log_ene_orcish_prison_camp: Our scout discovered a camp where orcs hold humans captive
en.log_ene_prisoner_wagon: Our scout discovered a wagon full of prisoners. Some bandits guard it
en.log_ene_rat_cellar: Our scout discovered a cellar infested by ravenous rats
en.log_ene_raider_hideout: Our scout discovered a raider hideout. Open, Sesame!
en.log_ene_rusted_warehouse: Our scout discovered an isolated and rusted warehouse
en.log_ene_save_damned: Our scout found some inhabitants lost in the darkness
en.log_ene_skullface_encampment: Our scout discovered where Skullface is hiding, we just have to eliminate him
en.log_ene_sleeping_titan: Our scout discovered the legendary sleeping Titan!
en.log_ene_snakes_nest: Our scout discovered a nest full of snakes
en.log_ene_spider_forest: Our scout discovered a dense forest full of giant cobwebs
en.log_ene_smuggler_warehouse: Our scout discovered a smuggler warehouse
en.log_ene_son_atamar: Our scout found, in an old destroyed farm, where the son of Atamar gather
en.log_ene_south_sacred_place: Our scout discovered the south sacred place!
en.log_ene_strange_village: Our scout discovered a strange village, he was attacked by the inhabitants who showed a strange aggressiveness, they seemed bewitched
en.log_ene_succubus_library: Our scout discovered a dark library inhabited by succubus
en.log_ene_swarm_wasp: Our scout discovered a huge swarm of giant wasp roaming the land!
en.log_ene_temple_gargoyle: Our scout discovered a temple in a very dense forest, it is guarded by gargoyles
en.log_ene_troll_cave: Our scout discovered a cave of trolls, better to stay away until our army is powerful enough
en.log_ene_vampire_crypt: Our scout discovered a crypt of vampire, we must investigate
en.log_ene_vampire_lair: Our scout find the vampire, her power is a threat to any free citizen of Theresmore
en.log_ene_west_sacred_place: Our scout discovered the west sacred place!
en.log_ene_wind_elemental_circle: Our scout discovered the Wind elemental circle!
en.log_ene_wolf_pack: Our scout discovered a large pack of wolves
en.log_ene_worn_down_crypt: Our scout discovered a worn down crypt in a secluded section of a spooky forest. Skeletal knights guard it
en.log_ene_wyvern_nest: Our scout discovered the nest of some wyverns. These dragon-like animals are very strong and territorial
en.log_ene_zombie_horde_small: Our scout found a small horde of zombie
en.log_ene_zombie_horde_large: Our scout found a large horde of zombie
en.log_ene_zombie_horde_huge: Our scout found a huge horde of zombie
en.log_fam_30: Your leadership is recognized within our small settlement
en.log_fam_70: Our village is expanding and beginning to be a point of reference for the nearby valleys
en.log_fam_150: Our village and your exploits begin to be appreciated regionally
en.log_fam_300: Thanks to technological innovation and newly built infrastructures, our village is now known within tens of miles
en.log_fam_700: The way you guided a small village to greatness granted you a place in the annals of Theresmore
en.log_fam_1100: We can begin to speak of a human nation with our great city at its center
en.log_starving: Your settlement is starving, produce food!
en.log_village_empty: Your village is empty, look for some new technology
en.log_fai_accept_druid: The Druid and his beliefs are increasing day by day, we have made him high priest and now he will grant us his blessing
en.log_fai_amusement_quarter_f: Now we can build the Amusement Quarter
en.log_fai_armored_caravan_p: Now we can recruit Armored Caravan
en.log_fai_banish_druid: The city's guards enter the spiritual gardens where the Druid was circling more and more people, without a chance to retaliate, the druid is kicked out of the city with a ban on entering it again. The plants in the garden seemed to wither away at the time when the druid was seized with rage and more than one witness swears that he saw a fire coming from his eyes
en.log_fai_city_blessing: We need to increase the production of modern weapons and create extra defenses. This spell will help us
en.log_fai_control_fortress: Now we can build the Soulstealer Citadel
en.log_fai_demonology: By studying the newly defeated demons we figured out how to harness their power and how to find the place they come from. We have to send our scouts to reconnoiter
en.log_fai_demoniac_tome: Tome contains many dark spells and a pact between a mistress and her servants. Perhaps the people in the village were the servants of some higher demon. There are clues in the tome to look for this entity. Let's send our scouts out to explore!
en.log_fai_dragon_skull: With that skull we have the ability to arm our soldiers with weapons and armor of the highest level. Let us hope that the old man's words did not match the truth
en.log_fai_enhanced_barracks_f: Now we can build Enhanced Barracks
en.log_fai_enchanted_bullet: Now we can cast Enchanted Bullets
en.log_fai_eureka_halls_f: Now we can build the Eureka Halls
en.log_fai_fate_shrine_f: Now we can build the Fate Shrine
en.log_fai_life_magic_p: Now we can cast Life Magic
en.log_fai_gold_consecration: Now that divine power is also with us we must increase our gold reserves even more
en.log_fai_gold_factory_f: Now we can build Gold Factory
en.log_fai_gold_trasmutation: Now we can cast Gold Trasmutation, Zenix now can choose 2 mutual specialization
en.log_fai_highschool_magic: Now we can build the Highschool of Magic
en.log_fai_hope_children: The children subjected to Gulud's magic are overloaded with magical power; their singing and hope will guide humanity! Now we can cast The Children Hope spell
en.log_fai_ivory_tower_f: Now we can build the Ivory Tower!
en.log_fai_lucky_grove_f: Now we can build the Lucky Grove
en.log_fai_lucky_well_f: Now we can build the Lucky Well
en.log_fai_lumix_fountain: Now we can cast Lumix Fountain
en.log_fai_lumix_refinery_f: Now we can build Lumix Refinery
en.log_fai_mage_academy_f: Now we can build the Mage Academy
en.log_fai_magic_workshop_f: Now we can build Magic Workshop
en.log_fai_mana_armor_p: Now we can cast Magic horse harnesses
en.log_fai_mana_factory_f: Now we can build Mana Factory
en.log_fai_mage_fields_f: Now we can build Mana Fields
en.log_fai_mana_flowers_p: Now we can cast Mana Flowers
en.log_fai_mana_forest_p: Now we can cast Mana Forest
en.log_fai_mana_fortress_p: Now we can recruit Mana Fortress
en.log_fai_mana_materials_p: Now we can cast Mana Materials
en.log_fai_mana_spiral_p: Now we can cast Mana Spiral
en.log_fai_magic_stable_f: Now we can build Mana Stable
en.log_fai_northern_star_power: We can use the power of the Northern Star in two ways: to protect our city or channel its energy to produce more. Only one of the two powers is obtainable; choose carefully
en.log_fai_philosopher_stone_p: Now we can cast Philosopher Stone
en.log_fai_power_spell_fireball: Now we can cast Power Spell Fireball
en.log_fai_prayer_for_the_ancient_monk: We can now train warrior monks
en.log_fai_prayer_goddess_luck: Luck is an asset that everyone should keep in mind on Theresmore, the more luck, the better
en.log_fai_prayer_lonely_druid: The request for a blessing to the Druid has been granted, and a powerful spell can now be cast. The Druid's creed banishes natronite and despises vile money, why is it granted in his blessing instead?
en.log_fai_sacred_den_f: Now we can build Sacred Den
en.log_fai_sacred_place: We can now send our scouts to discover the sacred places around Theresmore. Conquering them, we can channel all the mana into a Tower and cast the 4 Spells of Power. This will be our goal for the prestige of Ascension
en.log_fai_speel_book_p: Now we can cast Speel Book Magic
en.log_fai_steel_palace_f: Now we can build the Steel Palace!
en.log_fai_strange_lamp: Handling the lamp, it activated and a Djinn came out, thanking us for freeing him: he flew away with a loud laugh. We should send our scouts to look for his home
en.log_fai_summon_nikharul: Now we can summon Nikharul the Soulstealer in the army!
en.log_fai_the_aid: To solve the refugees problem we will have to create a new district, it will cost us a lot in terms of resources, but we can then make something out of the work of all these people
en.log_fai_temple_mirune: Mirune the woods goddess has granted us a powerful spell. Now we can cast it
en.log_fai_tome_wisdom_p: Now we can cast Tome of Wisdom Magic
en.log_fai_underground_tunnel_f: Now we can build the Underground Tunnel
en.log_fai_zenix_aid: Following the way of Atamar and with the teachings of Zenix we will now be able to train the Strategist. The archmage returns to his lands promising help when times become darker
en.log_fai_zenix_shield: Now we can cast Zenix Shield
en.log_spy_full: The spy mission has succeeded, the enemy has:
en.log_spy_up50: The spy mission was a partial success, here is what was discovered about the enemy:
en.log_spy_down50: The spy mission was a failure, no information was recovered. You must send more spies for higher probability of success
en.log_tec_abyss_shrine: We can now build one of the Shrine
en.log_tec_activate_signal: Activating the Signal Machine unleashed a torrent of arcane energy, echoing through the Abyss and beyond
en.log_tec_agricolture: Being able to feed the population has always been the biggest problem for early human settlements. We can now build Farm
en.log_tec_aid_request: It seems that the natives have been attacked by giant two-headed creatures and some of them are prisoners. They require a helping hand to free their comrades. We send our scouts to see what this is all about
en.log_tec_alchemical_reactions: With saltpetre and mana, we can transmute matter and increase our productions
en.log_tec_alchemist_complex_t: Now we can build Alchemist complex
en.log_tec_ancient_artifact: We are in search of the Eons Crystal, we embarked on a quest to locate it, driven by the hope that its discovery would hold the key to halting the elven decay once and for all. Let's send our scouts
en.log_tec_ancient_balor_t: Now we can summon the Ancient Balor
en.log_tec_angel_palace_t: Now we can build the Angels Palace
en.log_tec_assembly_line: Now we can build the Factory
en.log_tec_astronomy: By building observatories we will be able to train Skymancers
en.log_tec_archery: We can start train archers and scouts, it will consume food but will provide us with protection and we can send scouts to understand Theresmore and its mysteries. The army is divided into categories, each of which has advantages against another. Tank is strong against Cavalry, Cavalry is strong against Ranged, Ranged is strong against Shock, Shock is strong against Tank
en.log_tec_artillery_officer_t: We can now build Artillery Officer
en.log_tec_ancient_stockpile: We can explore the ancient vault and guard its secrets
en.log_tec_architecture: We can now build the Carpenter workshop and the Mansion
en.log_tec_arcane_study: Now we can build the Arcane School
en.log_tec_artisan_complex: We can now build the Artisan Complex
en.log_tec_avatar_fate: We can now summon the Avatar of Fate
en.log_tec_bandit_chief: Skullface is somewhere in the neighboring provinces, we have to send our scouts and find him
en.log_tec_banking: Now we can build the Bank
en.log_tec_barbarian_tribes: Our scouts can now push further into the wastelands in search of even larger barbarian villages
en.log_tec_besieging_engineers: Now we can build the Siege Workshop
en.log_tec_black_artifact: The Crystal's power had devoured the surrounding lands, corrupting them with an ominous mist of malevolence. Within this mist, the Spawn of Evil took flight, mercilessly slaughtering anyone who dared to draw near. An army had to be dispatched to these accursed lands, to stand against this growing malevolence. Let's send our scouts!
en.log_tec_breeding: We can now train light cavalry, a good and fast assault unit. Now we can build Stable
en.log_tec_boot_camp_t: We can now build the Boot Camp
en.log_tec_bronze_working: We can train spearmen and warriors, our army can both defend and attack effectively. Units enter battle in a set order , in front will be the tanks and general melee units to absorb the blows while the firing units will be behind the lines and the last to die. Now we can build Barracks
en.log_tec_burned_farms: Farms were burned and all around the fields horribly mangled bodies were scattered. From the tracks it looks like the work of humanoid beings of great size. We must send our scouts
en.log_tec_canava_mercenary: Now we can recruit the Canava Guard, an elite mercenary troop from the nearby village
en.log_tec_cavern_artifact: We expected a tough fight instead the Crystal of Eons was abandoned on an old altar in this ancient ruined cave. We must create a containment capsule to harness its magical abilities
en.log_tec_centralized_power: Now we can build the Ministry of Development
en.log_tec_chemistry: Chemistry in Theresmore is more a matter for alchemists. Now we can build Alchemical laboratory
en.log_tec_cloistered_life: We can now build the Monastery
en.log_tec_colonial_camp: We can now build the Military Camp
en.log_tec_colonial_consacration: We can now build the Holy Site
en.log_tec_colonial_docks: We can now build the Dock
en.log_tec_colonial_exploitations: We can build the Builders Complex
en.log_tec_colonial_recruits: We can now build the Colony Recruiting Camp
en.log_tec_colonial_stronghold: We can now build the Stronghold
en.log_tec_colonial_trade: We can now build the Custom House
en.log_tec_cpt_galliard_t: Now we can train the Captain Galliard
en.log_tec_craftsmen_guild: We can now build the Guild of Craftsmen
en.log_tec_create_annhilator: Once created, the Annihilator could be unleashed into the Abyss, triggering not only the destruction of our enemies but also unleashing radiation that might cause dire repercussions across all of Theresmore
en.log_tec_crop_rotation: FAME is a resource you get from the great works or great deeds you will do in Theresmore. At prestige time it will be used to calculate your LEGACY points that will allow you to get permanent bonuses in each of your game runs!
en.log_tec_crossbow: We can train crossbowmen, a very effective unit at medium distance
en.log_tec_crystal_farm_t: We can now build Crystal Farm
en.log_tec_communion_nature: Now we can build the spiritual garden, a source of mana and hope
en.log_tec_currency: Now we can build the Marketplace
en.log_tec_ecology: Now we can create real eden gardens and preserve Theresmore
en.log_tec_economics: Now we can build Residential block
en.log_tec_education: In the courtyard of our university we can dedicate a statue to a great person from the past. Only a statue can be built
en.log_tec_end_ancient_era: Let's finish the ancient era by building the City Center so we can advance
en.log_tec_end_feudal_era: Let's finish the feudal era by building the Academy of Freethinkers so we can advance
en.log_tec_elf_decadence: Once a vibrant and noble lineage, their once-pristine genetic heritage had been ravaged by the ravages of battle. The relentless onslaught of the orc horde had inflicted grievous wounds upon their delicate DNA, unleashing a torrent of mutations and genetic aberrations that plagued their kind. We must aid them. Let's build the Sanctum of Healing
en.log_tec_elf_last_village: Thanks to the QualarNuud, the Elves may still have hope in Theresmore. Their species is on the brink of extinction, but proudly they will resist their fate. Now we can build Elf Village
en.log_tec_elf_survivors: The elven race is native to the continent where we have established our colony. They have been at war since ancestral times with the QualarRoktam which means those who carry weapons. They are reduced to a few thousand individuals and are close to extinction. Now we can build the Elf encampment near our colony so we can house them and better understand their traditions
en.log_tec_elf_warriors: Now we can train the Elf warrior
en.log_tec_elves_thrive: Now we can build the Elf town
en.log_tec_embassy_nation: Now we can build the Allied Embassy
en.log_tec_espionage: Now we can train spies, to get intel about our enemies
en.log_tec_establish_boundaries: As our city has expanded, we have realized that our borders are far from secure. Rumors of an approaching danger to the east are swirling among our scouts. We must be very careful
en.log_tec_explore_surrounding: We must dispatch our scouts to unveil what lies in the eternal darkness of the Abyss
en.log_tec_dark_castle: We must search for the Dark Castle in the region. Attention to those who inhabit it
en.log_tec_dark_crystal: Behold the ominous dark crystal, pulsating with an aura of malevolence and wickedness. It is said to possess a power so corrupt and unholy that it can fuel the very heart of darkness itself. A tool of unspeakable evil, it can be wielded as a catalyst to summon forth the abominable Nikharul or as a source of inexhaustible energy to power the fortress and all its accursed devices
en.log_tec_dark_land: We have to explore the Abyss more!
en.log_tec_daylong_celebration: You enter the square and are celebrated as a hero by all the residents, you have saved the settlement from certain death, and everyone will be eternally grateful. Your fame has increased, soon even the most distant peoples will know our deeds!
en.log_tec_decrypt_signal: The more they unraveled, the clearer it became that these were not just random data but carefully encoded instructions for constructing an advanced device. The schematics depicted components and mechanisms beyond their current understanding, suggesting a machine capable of harnessing immense powerpossibly enough to combat the malevolent forces of the Abyss or even alter the balance of their world. The scientists' excitement grew as they pieced together the plans. The machine appeared to integrate both magical and technological elements, a perfect blend of arcane knowledge and futuristic innovation. This discovery held the potential to be a game-changer in their struggle against Baron Mordecai and his dark legions
en.log_tec_delimiting_perimeter: Now we can build the Light Turret
en.log_tec_deserter_origin: These deserters called themselves Sons of Atamar, we need to find out more with our scouts
en.log_tec_destroy_annhilator: We have , for Theresmore's sake, decided not to unleash the Annihilator. Now we must get rid of the forces of evil and discover the origin of all this darkness!
en.log_tec_dimensional_device: Now we can train Jager. Shinzou wo sasageyo!
en.log_tec_drain_mana: Now we can build the Mana Battery
en.log_tec_extensive_cultivation_t: Now we can build Extensive Cultivation
en.log_tec_exterminate_competition: We are one step away from being the richest ever, let's raise our treasure again and no one will be able to hinder us anymore
en.log_tec_fairs_and_markets: Now we can build a Great Fair
en.log_tec_faith_world: Now we can build the Pilgrim Camp
en.log_tec_favor_gods: Now we can build the Glory of the Gods
en.log_tec_feudalism: Feudalism opened the door to a new concept of society, where the estates and fiefdoms of small and large lords prospered undisturbed. Now we can build the Fiefdom
en.log_tec_financial_markets: Now we can build the credit union and accumulate even more gold
en.log_tec_field_artillery: Now we can train cannons, who knows if they can shoot down giants as well?
en.log_tec_flame_atamar: Now we can choose what to do with the Flame: ATTENTION one choice will exclude the other!
en.log_tec_flight: Natronite-fueled hot air balloons will serve as lookouts
en.log_tec_flintlock_musket: We can now train line infantry
en.log_tec_food_conservation: We can now build the Grocery
en.log_tec_fortification: Now we can build Palisade and Wall
en.log_tec_fortified_colony: Now we can build the Fortified Citadel
en.log_tec_free_old_outpost: Galliard taught our scouts how to find an old outpost still held by mercenaries. Let's send out our scouts!
en.log_tec_large_storage_space: Now we can build the Large Storehouse
en.log_tec_large_defensive_project: Now we can build the Great Bombard
en.log_tec_large_shed_t: Now we can build Large shed
en.log_tec_library_of_souls: The library has many missing but after some time of study it is easy to deduce that is a collection of unholy magic practices, those who learn such knowledge can offer up pieces of their soul to the well in exchange for freedom from their mortal shackles
en.log_tec_light_square: Now we can build the Light Square
en.log_tec_lonely_druid: This druid appeared out of nowhere in the city and professes harmony and love for the communion of humans with Theresmore. He is averse to modernity and indiscriminate exploitation of resources. His beliefs are rapidly proselytizing, and more and more people in town are going to listen to his words
en.log_tec_long_expedition: Now finally scouts will have new ways to die, what will they discover?
en.log_tec_galliard_secret: The captain possesses a valuable trinket that holds a special significance to him. He recalls an ancient hiding spot from his childhood, a place where he would seek refuge from the world. We need to find the shelter, send our scouts!
en.log_tec_galliard_true_form: Galliard's power is one of unparalleled might, a gift that sets him apart as a champion of humanity. With a single transformation, he becomes a towering behemoth. In his giant form, he is a relentless warrior, striking fear into the hearts of his enemies and inspiring hope in those he protects
en.log_tec_genetic_hub_t: Now we can build Genetic Hub
en.log_tec_glorious_parade: You are carried in triumph along the streets of the city in a great celebration that not even late at night intends to die down. From every corner of the neighboring provinces flock to the city to see the dragon exterminator! (Even if he was only put to flight at the moment)
en.log_tec_glorious_retirement: AH, a glorious retirement! the first prestige in Theresmore! Prestige is a key mechanic in Theresmore; it gives you bonuses that you could never get in other ways. It's always worth it
en.log_tec_grain_surplus: We can now build the Granary
en.log_tec_guide_mankind: We can now build the Guide of Mankind
en.log_tec_guild: A guild of explorers is now ready to lend its services
en.log_tec_gunpowder: We can train arquebusiers, together with our shock troops will dominate the battlefields
en.log_tec_joyful_nation_1: Each battle makes the triumph greater. Let us look to the sky and be aware that whatever difficulties Theresmore still has in store for us we can face and master them!
en.log_tec_joyful_nation_2: Each battle makes the triumph greater. Let us look to the sky and be aware that whatever difficulties Theresmore still has in store for us we can face and master them!
en.log_tec_harbor_project: Now we can build the Harbor district
en.log_tec_herald_canava: A laborer from the small border village, Canava, managed to get to the city. He brings with him alarming news of a goblin invasion from the east, the village of Canava has been destroyed. We must build some watchman outpost to survey the surroundings of the settlement
en.log_tec_honor_humanity: After the battle for Ogsog our infantry knows that orcs are a colossal enemy but they can never stop us! For victory!
en.log_tec_holy_fury: We can now train Battle Angels, to release the holy fury on the battlefield
en.log_tec_house_of_workers: Now we can build the House of Workers
en.log_tec_housing: We can now build Common house
en.log_tec_huge_cave_t: The cavern branches off into a maze of tunnels , we must send our explorers!
en.log_tec_lumix_t: We can now build Lumix Plant in the Colony
en.log_tec_knighthood: Knightly orders are the core of human nobility of Theresmore
en.log_tec_kobold_nation: Now we have to send our scouts to find the nation of Kobolds, but beware: I do not think they will be very friendly
en.log_tec_kobu_dominion: Our researchers have discovered the location of a storehouse belonging to the Kobu Dominion. Let's send our scouts to investigate
en.log_tec_human_dna: Now we can train super soldier with dna altered by the crystal, now we can recruit Steel Rider
en.log_tec_iron_working: We can now train heavy warriors, our artisan can now make iron weapons
en.log_tec_land_mine: Let's undermine the territories around the city, let those damn goblins come back, pieces of wolfrider will fly everywhere
en.log_tec_order_of_clerics: With the construction of a few conclaves we will have access to higher spells
en.log_tec_orcish_threat: Our most valiant generals will study a battle plan, our scouts will have to find out more about Orcish territory. Expect increasingly powerful attacks; we are up against a formidable enemy
en.log_tec_orcish_citadel: We send our scouts to find out where this fortified citadel is located. We must bring war to their lands, and perhaps we will have a way of frightening them
en.log_tec_pentagram_tome: The tome is written in a demonic language and the pentagram on the ground was used to subdue all those people in the village. We need to translate the tome; let's have our clergymen study it
en.log_tec_mankind_darkest: In the citadel we found maps of an operation about to be unleashed. Thousands of orcs are preparing to invade our lands, and 3 more orcish fortified bastions stand against us. Beasts thirsty for human blood are being spewed out of these strongholds all the time. Humanity's fate is being fulfilled, we must resist at all costs!
en.log_tec_mass_transit: Now we can build Logistic Center
en.log_tec_mercenary_abyss: Now we can build the Mercenary Camp
en.log_tec_necromancy: The necromancer had drawn his power from some dark force, we must follow its trail with the scouts
en.log_tec_northern_star: The Northern Star is imprisoned among the eternal ice. A monolith as black as night capable of radiating immense power. Our scholars must understand its workings, and soon we will be able to harness its power
en.log_tec_new_old_gods: Now we can build the Old Gods Church
en.log_tec_new_world_exploration: Now we can send our scout to explore new places. Our artisan can now make mithril weapons
en.log_tec_new_world_militia: Now we can recruit the Colonial Militia
en.log_tec_nuclear_power: Driven by the possibility of a new hope, the team dedicated themselves to understanding and building this powerful device, knowing that its successful construction could be the key to overcoming the pervasive darkness and securing a future for humanity and their allies. Now we can build Signal Machine
en.log_tec_machine_gun: The machine guns, with their gleaming barrels and intricate rune carvings, became a symbol of newfound strength and technological prowess. Capable of unleashing a relentless barrage of enchanted bullets, these weapons provided unparalleled defense against the dark legions of Baron Mordecai. Blending ancient magic with modern warfare, fortifying the human and elven forces in their battle against the encroaching darkness. Now we can train Machine Gun
en.log_tec_magic: Now we can build the Magic circle
en.log_tec_magic_arts_teaching: Now we can build the Magical tower
en.log_tec_mana_conveyors: By creating some pillars of mana we will be able to channel the energy of Theresmore and use it for both scientific and religious purposes
en.log_tec_mana_engine: By combining saltpetre with mana our scholars can create natronite, it will have unexpected uses
en.log_tec_mana_investigation: Now we can build the Mana Extractors
en.log_tec_mana_maker_t: Now we can build Mana Maker
en.log_tec_mana_reactors: Now we can build the Mana Reactor
en.log_tec_mana_utilization: We finish the third era by building a pit that can hold all the mana our sapients will need to discover fantastic new inventions
en.log_tec_manufactures: We can now create the builders' district to increase our wood and stone production
en.log_tec_market_laws: We can now build Financial Center
en.log_tec_master_history: Now we can build the Archeological Dig
en.log_tec_mathematic: With the discovery of mathematics we begin to get serious about productions
en.log_tec_mechanization: With mechanization we can speed up all areas of our production. Now we can build the Industrial plant
en.log_tec_mercenary_bands: We can now recruit mercenary veterans
en.log_tec_mercenary_outpost_t: Now we can build the Mercenary Outpost
en.log_tec_metal_alloys: We can now train the Artillery
en.log_tec_metal_casting: Now we can build the Foundry
en.log_tec_military_science: We can now train bombard to dominate the battlefield. We can now build the Military academy
en.log_tec_military_tactics: Now we can build the Officers training ground and enlist the General
en.log_tec_mining: Now we can build the Mine
en.log_tec_ministry_interior_t: Now we can build the Ministry of Interior
en.log_tec_ministry_war_t: Now we can build Ministry of War
en.log_tec_ministry_worship_t: Now we can build the Ministry of Worship
en.log_tec_miracle_city: Now we can build the Fountain of Prosperity, the druid has been miraculous for our city
en.log_tec_monster_epuration: Now we can build the Hall of heroic deeds!
en.log_tec_monster_hunting: There seem to be four legendary beasts: a gorgon, a five-headed hydra, a werewolf and a minotaur. By tracking them down and defeating them we can have fame and glory in abundance! Let our scouts set out on a quest!
en.log_tec_monument_past: Now we can build the Monument
en.log_tec_myth_south: Yet, driven by ambition and curiosity, the first expeditions set forth, braving the merciless sun, the whispering winds, and the shifting mirages that threatened to swallow them whole
en.log_tec_mythology: Now we can dedicate a shrine to our beliefs. Attention: only one shrine can be built
en.log_tec_municipal_administration: Now we can build the City Hall
en.log_tec_natrocity: Now we can build the City of Lights
en.log_tec_natronite_storage: Handle natronite with care. Now we can build Natronite depot
en.log_tec_oracle_t: Now we can build the Oracle
en.log_tec_overseas_refinery: Now we can build the Refinery
en.log_tec_overlook_darkness: Now we can build Gathering Area
en.log_tec_outpost_tiny_island: Now we can build the Island Outpost
en.log_tec_path_children: It seems that orcs kidnap children to turn them into their flame casters as adults. We must find Gulud Castle and put an end to this abomination
en.log_tec_persuade_people: We must find the Eternal Halls and defeat their guardians. Let us unleash our explorers.
en.log_tec_plate_armor: We can now recruit man at arms
en.log_tec_plenty_valley: Now we can build the Valley of plenty
en.log_tec_pottery: By working on the first pieces of craftsmanship, we can create tools. We can build the Artisan workshop
en.log_tec_port_statue: Now we can build the Statue of Virtues
en.log_tec_preparation_war: Now we will be able to create natronite shields capable of strengthening our defenses
en.log_tec_printing_press: In some newly printed newspapers there is a discussion about some legendary beasts that would inhabit Theresmore. We need to look into this topic further
en.log_tec_probes: The implementation of these surveillance-minefield probes marked a significant advancement in the defense strategy of the outpost, safeguard the explorers and researchers as they delved deeper into the Abyss. Now we can build Probe System
en.log_tec_professional_soldier: Now we can build the Recruit training center
en.log_tec_rage_druid: The Druid has cast off his mask of gentle holy man, his voice is somber and his eyes are as red as fire. He threatens the city and its citizens, speaks of an immense power that will soon come upon us and devour us. We must prepare for the worst
en.log_tec_railroad: Now we can build Railway Station
en.log_tec_regional_markets: From Canava and other nearby villages we can make several profits
en.log_tec_religion: By building a temple we will have access to prayers and spells
en.log_tec_religious_orders: Now we can build a Cathedral
en.log_tec_research_annhilator: The elves warn us that the power of the Annihilator cannot be controlled, and all of Theresmore will be in peril but humanity must have a weapon that can end the threat of darkness
en.log_tec_research_district: Now we can build the Research plant, our artisan can now make adamantium weapons
en.log_tec_restore_crystal: Nowe we can build the Kobu Crystal
en.log_tec_replicable_parts: Now we can build the Automated Complex
en.log_tec_remember_the_ancients: We can now build a Library to hold the knowledge of past generations
en.log_tec_rocketry: Alchemists and engineers combined magic with technology to create rockets capable of reaching the skies. This innovation allowed the launch of probes and satellites, providing crucial insights about celestial bodies and the dark forces beyond the Abyss. Now we can build Launch Silos
en.log_tec_safe_roads: We can now build the tax revenue checkpoints
en.log_tec_satellite: At this pivotal juncture, humanity achieved a groundbreaking milestone by launching the first rudimentary satellite into orbit. Powered by the extraordinary energy of Lumix and the combined efforts of alchemists and engineers, this satellite represented a leap into the unknown
en.log_tec_seafaring: A few days' sail to the west is a small island; we will have to conquer it so we can use it as an advanced supply base for our explorations. Let's send our scouts to visit it
en.log_tec_seraphim_t: Now we can train the Seraphim
en.log_tec_shores_theresmore: We have identified a place far from the borders of other kingdoms where we can build a harbor, now we can research the Harbor Project
en.log_tec_steel_flesh: We can now train the Behemoth
en.log_tec_steel_mills_t: We can now build Steel Mill
en.log_tec_steeling: A new resource made of other metals can now be produced and we can build the Steelworks, our artisan can now make steel weapons
en.log_tec_storage: Now we can build the Store
en.log_tec_storage_district: Enough of these caps! Now we can build the Storage facility and the Large warehouse
en.log_tec_storing_valuable_materials: We can now build the Guarded warehouse
en.log_tec_stone_masonry: We can now build the Quarry
en.log_tec_stone_processing: We can now build the Stonemason
en.log_tec_super_soldier: The repeater rifles, elegantly engraved with mystical runes and powered by Lumix, allowed for rapid successive shots. These weapons combined precision engineering with magical enhancements, making each shot more lethal than conventional firearms. The Riflemen, trained to master these powerful tools, became a formidable force on the battlefield. Now we can train Rifleman
en.log_tec_swear_give_up: After the battle for Turgon, humanity vowed never to surrender
en.log_tec_survey_abyss: We can now build the Abyss Outpost
en.log_tec_tamed_barbarian: We must find out with our scouts more about these barbarians so that we can export our civilization to them!
en.log_tec_temple_luna: The Elves ask us for help in returning to them the Luna Temple long under the hands of the QualarRoktam. Let us send our scouts!
en.log_tec_the_scourge: Refugees tell of entire villages burned by a flying monster, and all along the western border a mass of displaced people are coming toward the city
en.log_tec_the_signal: As the data streamed back from the satellite, the researchers quickly gathered to decode and analyze the signal. Its origins were mysterious, suggesting a source far beyond their known realm. The signal carried patterns and frequencies that hinted at advanced technology or perhaps an ancient civilization lost to time. This powerful transmission held potential answers to many of the mysteries that plagued the Abyss, and perhaps even clues about the dark forces threatening their existence. The discovery ignited a renewed sense of urgency and determination among the human and elven alliance, as they prepared to delve deeper into the cosmos to uncover the secrets that the signal might reveal
en.log_tec_the_triumph: Theresmore is safe, the continents are saved from the Orcish horde. You are the hero of two worlds! Now we can build the Arch of Triumph!
en.log_tec_titan_mosaic: A Native legend tells of this mosaic. Somewhere on the continent there is a sleeping titan , whoever can wake him up will get his blessing. We must find him and wake him up!
en.log_tec_tome_ancient_lore: The tome chronicles the cyclical history of humanity. Through its pages, we uncovered new techniques for production, research, and other untold secrets. The ancient text held within it a wealth of knowledge, illuminating paths forward and unlocking mysteries of the past
en.log_tec_trail_blood: We have a trail of blood. We still have to send our scouts to find the vampire
en.log_tec_trail_fire: What the explorers believed to be a mirage soon revealed itself as a truth beyond reckoning. Before them stretched an impossible sight: a sea of molten rock, a vast ocean of living flame that churned and roared as if possessed of a will. Rivers of magma cut through the earth like veins of a dying god, feeding into a colossal crater at the heart of the inferno
en.log_tec_trail_power: We have to win the approval of the kingdom, we can either persuade the nobility or win the hearts of the people. We choose carefully because one option EXCLUDES the other
en.log_tec_training_militia: We can now build the Castrum Militia
en.log_tec_trenches: Now we can build Trench and train Marksman
en.log_tec_tyrant_ash: Deep within the molten desert, where the very air burned and the ground trembled with the breath of something vast, Azrathis had forged his dominion. We need to send our scout
en.log_tec_vaelgoroth_t: Now we can summon Vaelgoroth the Crimson Doom
en.log_tec_veteran_artillerymen: We can now build the Artillery Firing Range
en.log_tec_warfare: The art of war will give rise to a great commander in our nation
en.log_tec_white_t_company: We can now train the White Company
en.log_tec_wings_freedom: We must free Galliard from his obsession. We must find the ancient giant! Let's send the Scout Regiment on a mission!
en.log_tec_wood_cutting: We can now build Lumberjack camp
en.log_tec_wood_saw: We can now build the Sawmill
en.log_tec_writing: We can now build the School
en.log_tec_underground_library: Descending into the depths of the library, one encounters countless undead creatures lurking in the shadows. They seem bored but their gaze never leaves the intruder. As we proceed, the creatures become more numerous and aggressive. The air is thick with decay and we hear skittering sounds in the darkness. It's clear that the library was just the beginning of the challenges that lie ahead. Let's send our scout to explore
en.log_tec_underground_kobold_mission: Now our scouts can find out what lies behind the kobold tunnels
en.log_tec_underground_rooms: Now we can build the Underground House and Store and the Mining Area
en.log_tec_zenix_familiar_t: We can now train Zenix Familiar
en.log_tec_zenix_return: Under Zenix's guidance, progress accelerated. He shared forgotten spells and enchantments that augmented the capabilities of their new weapons and defenses, and his strategic insights helped fortify their positions against the impending assault from the evil legions. With the Archmage's help, humanity stood a fighting chance. The construction of the enigmatic machine neared completion, and with it, the hope that they could finally turn the tide against the darkness and reclaim their future from the clutches of the Abyss. Now we can research more in Magic tab

en.not_10_abyss_outpost: A Large Army for the Abyss
en.not_15_abyss_outpost: A Huge Army for the Abyss
en.not_attack_incoming: Our watchmen have discovered an impending attack! TO THE WALLS!
en.not_10_crystal_farm_b: More Crystal in the New World
en.not_10_gathering_area: A train of resource in the Abyss
en.not_15_gathering_area: Plenty of resource in the Abyss

en.not_5_launch_silos: What we have to do with these?
en.not_tab_magic: We have access to prayers and spells
en.not_tab_marketplace: Finally the market! Now we can buy and sell goods
en.not_new_version: A new version of Theresmore is available, close the notification to apply the update
en.not_remember_save: Just a reminder that you may want to backup your save every once in a while, just in case
en.not_15_shed: A lot of space in the colony
en.not_10_steel_mills_b: Steel Mill of a New World
en.not_5_credit_union: A new way of making gold
en.stat_empty: You have to play more to get statistics
en.tec_abyss_shrine_description: We can erect a Shrine of power in the Abyss
en.tec_activate_signal_description: We can activate the Signal Machine to fully harness his power
en.tec_adamantium_shield_description: Adamantium shield to protect the army
en.tec_agricolture_description: The hard work of cultivating the land always gives its fruits
en.tec_agreement_passage_wanders_descriptio: With this agreement we can freely explore the lands of Wanders now that we are allies
en.tec_aid_request_description: The strange creatures were observing our colony in order to open a communication with us. They seem to have some kind of request. Our scholars must also interpret their language with the help of magic
en.tec_alchemical_reactions_description: Through alchemy we will be able to further increase our productions
en.tec_alchemist_complex_t_description: The production of a regular army needs a lot of saltpetre
en.tec_ancient_artifact_description: The ancestors of the elves drew their power from an ancient lost artifact
en.tec_angel_palace_t_description: Angels want to help us in the Abyss
en.tec_arcane_study_description: Within our outpost, we can delve into the arcane arts that this place has to offer
en.tec_archery_description: The bow will allow us to strike from a safe distance
en.tec_architecture_description: The Middle Ages gave impulse to our builders to realize great works
en.tec_artillery_officer_t_description: We need to train the best artillery officers
en.tec_veteran_artillerymen_description: Let's train our sappers in marksmanship
en.tec_architecture_titan_t_description: The construction knowledge of the titans
en.tec_artisan_complex_description: Let's exploit the colony's mineral resources
en.tec_assembly_line_description: Assembly lines will bring us into the industrial age
en.tec_astronomy_description: We must turn our gaze to the sky if we want to leave behind the feudal era
en.tec_ancient_stockpile_description: Past generations have left us ancient warehouses
en.tec_atomic_theory_description: Elves have a deep knowledge of the stuff that things are made of
en.tec_bandit_chief_description: One bandit questioned for information told us about a leader calling himself Skullface from whom they all took orders
en.tec_banking_description: What's mine is mine, what's yours is mine
en.tec_barbarian_tribes_description: From the torture, err no, investigations carried out in the barbarian village we found out that their nation is divided into tribes
en.tec_beacon_faith_description: Dedicate the colony to magic and faith. Only ONE specialty can be chosen
en.tec_besieging_engineers_description: With the advent of siege techniques, we can increase the strength of our artillery
en.tec_biology_description: Theresmore's nature study applied to the lives of citizens
en.tec_boot_camp_t_description: A place where we can train our soldiers
en.tec_breeding_description: We will have to breed the best horses in Theresmore
en.tec_bronze_working_description: The Bronze Age, one of my favorite eras!
en.tec_bronze_shield_description: Shield in bronze to protect the army
en.tec_burned_farms_description: We need to investigate what happened to the isolated farms, the disappearance of all the children is very disturbing
en.tec_canava_mercenary_description: Elite mercenary troops on our payroll
en.tec_centralized_power_description: Now more than ever we need to maintain a strong centralized power
en.tec_chemistry_description: Chemistry is the art of studying Theresmore in its components
en.tec_craftsmen_guild_description: With the craftsmen's guild we will be able to increase the production of Tier 2 resources!
en.tec_create_annhilator_description: Once created, the Annihilator could be unleashed into the Abyss
en.tec_crop_rotation_description: Crop rotation is a fundamental process for keeping fields productive
en.tec_crossbow_description: More powerful than the bow is also much easier to use
en.tec_crystal_farm_t_description: Crystals are an increasingly valuable commodity, we need to create more of them
en.tec_colonial_camp_description: We create an outpost in the new world
en.tec_colonial_consacration_description: Our colony has grown enough to consecrate it with a holy site
en.tec_colonial_docks_description: Let's build a dock to exploit maritime resources
en.tec_colonial_exploitations_description: In the new world there are so many basic resources
en.tec_colonial_recruits_description: New soldiers from the new world
en.tec_colonial_stronghold_description: We create a stronghold that enemies are annihilated by it
en.tec_colonial_trade_description: Now that the colony has grown we need to derive revenue from it
en.tec_construction_of_automata_description: We have studied the undead enough to develop our own mana-powered servant
en.tec_commercial_monopolies_description: In order to grow even more economically we must create commercial monopolies and a stock exchange
en.tec_communion_nature_description: Our beliefs must be reconciled with Mother Nature
en.tec_conquer_abyss_description: As we release this dark domain the grip of darkness fades in our world
en.tec_cuirassiers_description: With firearms we can create very heavy mounted regiments
en.tec_dark_castle_description: The patrol of dark knights came from a stronghold nearby we must look for it to take over the surrounding area
en.tec_dark_crystal_description: Nikharul source of power lies on the battlefield
en.tec_dark_land_description: We are discovering more and more about this dark and mysterious land
en.tec_daylong_celebration_description: After the victory over the goblins, the people gathered in the square to celebrate
en.tec_decrypt_signal_description: The scientists immediately set to work decrypting the enigmatic signal, which seemed to contain information about a new tecnology
en.tec_delimiting_perimeter_description: Now, we need to delineate the perimeter with light turrets to expand and safeguard our small outpost
en.tec_deserter_origin_description: We need to find out more about where these defectors came from
en.tec_destroy_annhilator_description: The risks to Theresmore are too great, let's destroy this abomination and give the technology to our troops
en.tec_dimensional_device_description: A new way of fighting by exploiting natronite to give soldiers three dimensional movement capabilities for short periods
en.tec_dirty_money_description: From the Lucky Well gold for mercenaries
en.tec_dragon_assault_description: One late summer afternoon, the sentries on the western walls discerned a dark spot on the horizon. Over the next few hours the spot became a cloud and then a storm that loomed over the city. A tempest as red as fire, the beast of fire was here to claim its artifact
en.tec_drain_mana_description: From the darkness that permeates the Abyss, we can extract and harness mana, creating mana batteries to store this mystical energy
en.tec_drilling_operation_description: The drilling process will help produce more and more metals
en.tec_drone_description: The Kobu Dominion will teach us to build mechanical scouts
en.tec_ecology_description: Now that our civilization is evolving, we must not forget the natural roots of Theresmore
en.tec_economics_description: With an advanced economy, will increase the general welfare
en.tec_education_description: Theresmore begins to unravel its secrets and we must discover as much as possible
en.tec_effort_abyss_description: We must increase our productions to resist the Abyss
en.tec_elf_decadence_description: The aftermath of the war against the orcs had left the elven race in a state of profound decline
en.tec_embassy_nation_description: Now that we are allied with powerful nations we will have to build an embassy
en.tec_end_ancient_era_description: Our settlement is ready for a leap forward
en.tec_end_era_4_1_description: Now that our city is safe we must build the Harbor District and start a new adventure
en.tec_end_era_4_2_description: Now that our city is safe we must build the Harbor District and start a new adventure
en.tec_elf_last_village_description: The elves, grateful for returning the precious temple to them, take us to their last village
en.tec_elf_survivors_description: The natives we rescued call themselves Elves and call us humans by the term QualarNuud, those who came from the vast sea
en.tec_elf_warriors_description: The Elves trust us enough to grant us some of their warriors in battle
en.tec_elves_thrive_description: Thanks to their renewed state of health, elves can thrive
en.tec_espionage_description: Some of our scouts might specialize in the art of espionage
en.tec_establish_boundaries_description: We need to create defined boundaries for our realm
en.tec_eureka_description: Looks like some kind of refund!
en.tec_exhibit_flame_description: We can exhibit the Flame of Atamar in the city center to enrich it enormously
en.tec_explore_sorrounding_description: In the enveloping chaos and true evil that shrouds the surrounding areas, despair may be all that awaits
en.tec_extensive_cultivation_t_description: We have to produce more food to develop the Abyss settlement
en.tec_exterminate_competition_description: We will produce so much gold to exterminate the competition
en.tec_fairs_and_markets_description: We can organize a big fair
en.tec_faith_world_description: We bring the faith of ancient gods to the new world
en.tec_fallen_angel_description: An army of demons is marching against the city, they are led by a knight with black wings! Let us prepare for battle!
en.tec_favor_gods_description: The Gods admire your courage and grant you fame and glory
en.tec_fertilizer_description: New chemical components will increase our food production
en.tec_feudalism_description: The birth of a new era: knights and castles and ladies to save
en.tec_field_artillery_description: The evolution of the bombard are field cannons
en.tec_financial_markets_description: New ideas on how to accumulate money
en.tec_fine_lucky_wood_description: We find a good type of wood in the Lucky Grove
en.tec_fine_woods_description: Our carvers are specializing more and more
en.tec_fine_marbles_description: The processing of precious marbles is attracting manpower
en.tec_flame_atamar_description: Now that we have conquered Zultan we must study the Flame of Atamar
en.tec_flight_description: The first timid hint of flight
en.tec_flintlock_musket_description: The evolution of arquebuses into a much more versatile weapon
en.tec_food_conservation_description: With food conservation we will be able to create supplies
en.tec_forging_equipments_description: Forge better equipment for the army
en.tec_forging_equipments_II_description: Forge much better equipment for the army
en.tec_fortification_description: High walls to defend our settlement
en.tec_fortified_colony_description: We turn the colony into a fortress
en.tec_fortify_abyss_description: We attracted VERY unwanted attention. We must fortify the settlement in the Abyss!
en.tec_fortune_sanctuary_description: We must build a place where the goddess of luck can infuse her power
en.tec_fountain_gold_description: A fountain of gold from the Lucky Well
en.tec_free_old_outpost_description: Cpt Galliard knows the location of an old outpost to be cleared
en.tec_galliard_mercenary_description: Captain Galliard after being defeated offers his services
en.tec_galliard_secret_description: The captain has a murky past about which he can hardly recall any details. We need to thoroughly investigate his background
en.tec_galliard_true_form_description: The encounter with the Ancient Giant awakened a power within Captain Galliard
en.tec_gather_bastion_description: We can train clerics in the Light Square
en.tec_gather_heavy_description: We can train steel riders in the Light Square
en.tec_gather_shooters_description: We can train marksmen in the Light Square
en.tec_gather_troops_description: We can train the line infantry in the Light Square
en.tec_genetic_hub_t_description: Genetic alterations can be applied to a variety of fields
en.tec_gold_domination_project_description: Now that we have the stock exchange we must commit our entire society to the project of global economic domination
en.tec_glorious_parade_description: The dragon army has been repelled and it is time to celebrate
en.tec_glorious_retirement_description: I've done a lot for Theresmore, it's time to take my leave
en.tec_grain_surplus_description: We need to better manage grain production and storage
en.tec_great_pastures_description: Having conquered the vast east we can now exploit its steppes
en.tec_guerrilla_warfare_description: Wilderness around the colony generates new combat tactics
en.tec_guide_mankind_description: The ultimate blueprint for guiding humanity
en.tec_guild_description: Corporations are born in the city
en.tec_gunpowder_description: With gunpowder we will have an advantage on the battlefield
en.tec_joyful_nation_1_description: We have annihilated the Fallen Angel we must celebrate!
en.tec_joyful_nation_2_description: We have annihilated the Fallen Angel we must celebrate!
en.tec_heirloom_housing_description: Give us workers for our village
en.tec_herald_canava_description: The messenger from the Kingdom of Canava comes galloping into the city. This research will allow us to build watchman outposts, crucial to the advance into the new era
en.tec_honor_humanity_description: Honor will guide us to victory! For humanity!
en.tec_house_of_workers_description: A living place for our workers
en.tec_housing_description: It's time to construct some dwellings
en.tec_huge_cave_t_description: We have to explore the cavern beneath the Library
en.tec_knighthood_description: The code of chivalry is the creed of the nobles of Theresmore
en.tec_kobold_nation_description: In the city of kobolds we found clues about a real underground megalopolis led by a King
en.tec_kobu_dominion_description: Our archeologists have discovered evidence of a lost civilization that once ruled this region. It's likely that their technology far surpassed our own
en.tec_kobu_dominion_storehouse_description: The storehouse is vast. Long corridors are lined with patterns of softly glowing blue, green, and amber lights
en.tec_harbor_project_description: We prepare a blueprint for a large port to explore and exploit the great sea
en.tec_holy_fury_description: The gods have given us battle angels
en.tec_human_dna_description: The crystal will give an unnatural long life to those who touch it
en.tec_infuse_flame_description: Infuse the flame to aid our army
en.tec_iron_working_description: Iron is a much stronger material than bronze, its uses will be multiple
en.tec_iron_shield_description: Iron shield to protect the army
en.tec_land_mine_description: We will be able to use explosives to protect the surroundings of the city
en.tec_landed_estates_description: Many landowners are moving to the new world
en.tec_large_defensive_project_description: At the military academy new projects are created for a super weapon capable of protecting our city
en.tec_large_shed_t_description: In the colony we have abundant space. Let's use it
en.tec_large_pastures_description: The agreement with the Wanders allows us to know better their breeding techniques
en.tec_launch_annhilator_description: I am become death, shatterer of worlds. This is a form of prestige and resets all progress made so far (except achievements, stats and legacy bonuses) and restarts a new game

en.tec_light_square_description: Our outpost in the Abyss has grown, we must create a square that shines in the darkness
en.tec_liturgical_rites_description: With the establishment of mana rites we will be able to explore new ways for our spells
en.tec_local_products_description: Artisan's workshops are beginning to produce efficiently
en.tec_lonely_druid_description: A small crowd is gathering around a lone druid
en.tec_long_expedition_description: With the new machines we can push our explorations much further
en.tec_loot_storehouse_description: We can supply our nation for centuries by dismantling the mysterious objects we discovered in the storehouse. You will not be able of Restore the Crystal if choose this one
en.tec_loved_people_description: At last the people of the west consider us their rightful ruler. Let us enjoy our reward
en.tec_lucky_idea_description: The Eureka Halls bring some lucky ideas
en.tec_illgotten_gains_description: We can use these funds to attract smugglers
en.tec_lucky_investments_description: We need investors in the Amusement Quarter
en.tec_lucky_little_city_description: The Amusement Quarter is like a little city now
en.tec_lumix_t_description: Our artisans need to develop a new technology capable of producing a material resistant to the destructive forces of the Abyss
en.tec_overseas_refinery_description: There is room for productive hubs in the new world
en.tec_plate_armor_description: Full armors burst on the battlefield
en.tec_preparation_war_description: Now that we know that an enemy is marching against us we must prepare defenses!
en.tec_prepare_tunnel_description: We have to setup a line of defense in the Underground Tunnel
en.tec_professional_soldier_description: We must create an army of trained soldiers
en.tec_poisoned_arrows_description: Now that we have defeated those goblins we can create arrows with their own type of poison
en.tec_port_statue_description: The design of a large statue to raise awareness of our nation
en.tec_machine_gun_description: Capable of unleashing a relentless barrage of enchanted bullets, these weapons provided unparalleled defense against the dark legions of Baron Mordecai
en.tec_magic_description: The Mana is the essence of Theresmore
en.tec_magic_arts_teaching_description: We study the magical arts in depth
en.tec_mana_conveyors_description: With the right research we should be able to convey a lot of mana
en.tec_mana_engine_description: Our scholars have in mind how to develop machinery capable of using mana
en.tec_mana_investigation_description: It seems that in the colony you can extract mana from the ground
en.tec_mana_maker_t_description: The settlement in the Abyss drain a huge amount of mana, we have to produce it more
en.tec_mana_reactors_description: Thanks to atomic theory we can create reactors that generate mana
en.tec_mana_utilization_description: Our researchers are discovering that with large amounts of mana we will be able to create new ways to change the lives of our citizens
en.tec_mankind_darkest_description: We triumphed over the Orcish citadel, but what was a victory soon turned into a distressing and terrible situation
en.tec_manufactures_description: Carvers and stonemasons create corporations in the city
en.tec_market_laws_description: We must study the Market Laws to make more gold!
en.tec_martial_arts_description: The discipline of fate in the martial arts
en.tec_mass_transit_description: We need to develop our transportation system
en.tec_master_craftsmen_description: True master craftsmen are emerging in the city
en.tec_master_history_description: In the Eureka Halls there is room for archeologists
en.tec_mathematic_description: Two plus two is always four
en.tec_mechanization_description: We develop our civilization with new machinery
en.tec_mercenary_abyss_description: Now that our outpost is large enough we can fund new mercenary housing
en.tec_mercenary_outpost_t_description: We conquered the outpost, let's make it a mercenary training center
en.tec_metal_alloys_description: New lighter alloys will have battlefield applications
en.tec_metal_casting_description: Metalworking is a fundamental process in developing our civilization
en.tec_mercenary_bands_description: A convenient resource for kingdoms that abound in gold
en.tec_mercenary_pockets_description: We found a way to improve our infantry uniforms with extra pockets
en.tec_military_colony_description: Dedicate the colony to military operations and power. Only ONE specialty can be chosen
en.tec_military_tactics_description: New weapons appear on the battlefield, and we will use them to pulverize our enemies
en.tec_mindless_evil_description: After defeating the Baron Mordecai and the Hand of Evil, an immense power rises upon us,it is the Mindless Evil itself, poised to destroy all of Theresmore
en.tec_moonlight_night_description: One night shortly after learning of the destruction of Canava the surroundings of our city became agitated, we may have to reinforce the defenses
en.tec_military_science_description: Scientific innovation at the service of the army
en.tec_mining_description: Copper and iron will come in handy
en.tec_miracle_city_description: Miraculous wonders are taking place in the city
en.tec_ministry_interior_t_description: Now our city is evolved enough to need a ministry for the interior
en.tec_ministry_war_t_description: Our civilization needs a ministry of war
en.tec_mithril_shield_description: Mithril shield to protect the army
en.tec_monster_epuration_description: Now that we have wiped out the monstrosities that threatened Theresmore we need to study how to benefit from them
en.tec_monster_hunting_description: We need to better investigate the rumors of these mysterious monsters
en.tec_mysterious_robbery_description: Large quantities of weapons are gone and also a lot of natronite, the Druid is missing: hopefully nothing has happened to him. We have to raise our guard

en.tec_mythology_description: The myths of Theresmore tell of great gods with majestic powers
en.tec_natrocity_description: Let's use natronite to light up our city
en.tec_natronite_storage_description: Natronite is as useful as it is dangerous, we need to build appropriate depots
en.tec_necromancy_description: The necromancer was aware of arcane arts long forgotten
en.tec_network_of_watchmen_description: We need sentinels on the walls
en.tec_new_old_gods_description: We need to erect a church in this untouched land
en.tec_new_world_exploration_description: We need to start exploring the new world
en.tec_new_world_militia_description: We must create a militia capable of defending the colony
en.tec_northern_star_description: The Nightdale Protectorate held the Northern Star, a very powerful artifact from the earliest days of Theresmore
