en.tec_orcish_citadel_description: Orcish armies come from a fortified citadel, we must besiege it
en.tec_orcish_threat_description: The orcs are becoming more dangerous every day, and we cannot allow them to kidnap our people for their vile purposes.  Their purpose is to kill and destroy; they will know the value of the humans of Theresmore
en.tec_order_of_clerics_description: Half priests and half soldiers, they will serve the human cause in Theresmore
en.tec_outpost_tiny_island_description: This small island is a paradise of unknown species. An outpost here could generate a lot of research
en.tec_overlook_darkness_description: We have to cautiously exploring the Abyss for resources, a strategic endeavor combining observation and magical insight
en.tec_path_children_description: In the citadel of Horith we found disturbing evidence
en.tec_pentagram_tome_description: In the strange village we found a pentagram and a tome written in an obscure language. We must investigate
en.tec_phalanx_combat_description: We will train our men to fight as one!
en.tec_portal_of_the_dead_description: From a place long forgotten and sealed away. Beware the dead guard the passage. Beware
en.tec_pottery_description: Ceramics will allow us to preserve things and will favor the birth of commerce
en.tec_probes_description: These probes served a dual purpose: as surveillance devices and as a network of magical landmines
en.tec_productive_hub_description: Dedicate the colony to resource production. Only one specialty can be chosen
en.tec_raider_teaching_description: Teaching the art of raiding to our cavalry!
en.tec_railroad_description: An iron horse? What kind of devilry is this?
en.tec_rage_druid_description: The following days the Druid showed up at the city gates
en.tec_regional_markets_description: With ancestral knowledge we can now create district markets at nearby villages
en.tec_religious_orders_description: Religious orders developed the concept of faith
en.tec_remember_the_ancients_description: Was there a lost civilization before us?
en.tec_replicable_parts_description: We develop automation through smaller and smaller components
en.tec_research_annhilator_description: We have to research the Annihilator, an arcane contrivance destined to purge any menace akin to the catastrophic power of a celestial inferno
en.tec_restore_crystal_description: We found the remains of a giant crystalline structure deep within the storehouse. Our researchers believe they can fuse the pieces back together with enough natronite. You will not be able of Loot the Storehouse if choose this one
en.tec_rocketry_description: The discovery of Lumix revolutionized technology, leading to advancements in rocketry
en.tec_safe_roads_description: Now that we have secured the roads we can develop a gab system
en.tec_satellite_description: Humanity achieved a groundbreaking milestone by launching the first rudimentary satellite into orbit. It will monitor climate and trade routes
en.tec_save_theresmore_description: With the defeat of the Mindless Evil, we rise as the triumphant saviors of Theresmore!
en.tec_scientific_theory_description: The birth of the scientific method is the key to knowledge
en.tec_scout_mission_east_description: Now that we have subdued the Wanders we can explore their lands freely
en.tec_seafaring_description: A great nation must rule the oceans, our inventors will succeed in creating natronite engines for our vessels
en.tec_seraphim_t_description: With the seraphim at our service, we will no longer have to fear the darkness
en.tec_servitude_description: I will serve you my master
en.tec_shores_theresmore_description: Far from our current borders there is access to a great sea, we must explore those places
en.tec_siege_defense_weapons_description: Arm our walls with ballistae to repel enemy attacks
en.tec_siege_techniques_description: We will be able to create more powerful siege machines than catapults
en.tec_steel_flesh_description: A new unit of flesh and steel will destroy our enemies
en.tec_steeling_description: With steel we can raise our military level to new heights
en.tec_steel_mills_t_description: We need to exploit the colony space to create large Steel Mills
en.tec_steel_shield_description: Steel shield to protect the army
en.tec_stone_extraction_tools_description: New stone extraction and processing techniques
en.tec_stone_masonry_description: The quarry is not a place for weak arms
en.tec_stone_processing_description: The stonemason will help us with the production of stone
en.tec_storage_description: We need more and more material!
en.tec_storing_valuable_materials_descripti: We need to create a guarded place to store our valuable materials
en.tec_strange_encounter_description: In the woods not far from the colony we make a strange discovery
en.tec_super_soldier_description: Clad in reinforced armor and wielding their enchanted repeater rifles, the Riflemen represented the pinnacle of military innovation
en.tec_survey_abyss_description: After building the Beacons of Light, our focus shifted to exploring the Abyss and creating fortified outposts in illuminated areas for safety and strategic advantage
en.tec_swear_give_up_description: We swear to never give up!
en.tec_persuade_nobility_description: Persuading the nobility will require a large amount of gold but will allow us to train the powerful knights of the west
en.tec_persuade_people_description: In order to break through to people's hearts, we must make a heroic gesture. Only by defeating a fearsome enemy will they consider us worthy
en.tec_plenty_valley_description: Our lands generate an abundance that should not be wasted
en.tec_tamed_barbarian_description: In the barbarian camp we just defeated, we tamed some of them to obey us. We have to find out more about these people
en.tec_temple_luna_description: The temple of Luna dear to the Elves has been desecrated by some wicked beings
en.tec_the_journey_description: We will go west where no human has gone before
en.tec_the_scourge_description: Some groups of refugees are asking to enter the city, something seems to have happened along the western borders
en.tec_the_vault_description: In order to start our world economic domination we need to hoard huge amounts of gold
en.tec_theresmore_richest_nation_descriptio: We finally made it, we are the richest nation in all of Theresmore
en.tec_titan_gift_t_description: We awakened the titan and after rich offerings he will grant us a gift!
en.tec_titan_mosaic_description: In the temple there is an immense mosaic depicting a sleeping Titan
en.tec_underground_kobold_mission_descripti: The tunnels of the kobolds branch off in several directions, we must explore them
en.tec_the_portal_t_description: We have to create a Portal to stop the flow of Evil
en.tec_the_signal_description: The satellite in orbit was reached by a powerful signal, seemingly emanating from the depths of outer space
en.tec_the_triumph_description: We have defeated the orcs and our triumph is total
en.tec_throwing_coin_description: It seems that throwing coins in the Lucky Well bring luck
en.tec_tome_ancient_lore_description: In the shelter of Galliard we found an ancient tome. We must study it
en.tec_trading_woods_description: Let's make some gold and wood from the Lucky Grove
en.tec_trail_blood_description: The vampire crypt contained no coffin, we must look elsewhere
en.tec_trail_fire_description: Beyond the dunes, we uncovered something far more sinister, a horizon that burned with unnatural light
en.tec_trail_power_description: The Western Kingdom is conquered but its people are hostile to us. We have to come up with something
en.tec_training_militia_description: We have seen how ruthless Theresmore can be, we must create a militia force
en.tec_trenches_description: Building trenches will not only help us with defense but will allow us to train Marksmen
en.tec_tunnel_hq_description: We have to setup an headquarter in the Underground Tunnel
en.tec_tyrant_ash: The Tyrant of Ash and Fire
en.tec_tyrant_ash_description: A sorcerer of the ancient world, he has tamed the greatest of beasts. He is know as Azrathis, the Flamebinder
en.tec_underground_library_description: The crypts under SouLs Library are dark places, we must explore them
en.tec_underground_rooms_description: Sheltered from the winds of death and the darkness, we should create underground chambers to expand our presence
en.tec_vaelgoroth_t_description: Now we can summon the Elder Dragon in our army
en.tec_warfare_description: Appear weak when you are strong, and strong when you are weak
en.tec_white_t_company_description: The famous White Company is ready to lend its services
en.tec_wall_titan_t_description: These walls will protect humanity for hundreds of years
en.tec_war_effort_description: The Orcish crisis is worrying the entire human population, a war effort is needed to deal with these bloodthirsty beasts
en.tec_wings_freedom_description: Entering the shelter triggered a mystical reaction in Galliard. He is absent and pale and keeps repeating about an ancient giant
en.tec_wood_cutting_description: Theresmore's lush forests will help our people prosper
en.tec_wood_saw_description: The production of wood needs new tools
en.tec_zenix_familiar_t_description: With a little food we could attract those cute little animals
en.tec_zenix_return_description: Archmage Zenix returned to lend his aid
en.tour_tab_research: There is a research available, use the button to see it
en.tour_housing: It's time to construct some dwellings! Use the button to complete the research
en.tour_tab_build: We can now build a common house, use the build button to see it
en.tour_common_house: But wait! We are missing some resources, you can hover over the button or hold it down to see the resources you need in red, you'll also see what you'll get if you complete the building in green
en.tour_resources_container: Here are your resources. Your settlement is starving, produce food!
en.tour_manual_resources_container: Use these buttons to produce resources. You can also select them to do it automatically. Once you have a few, you can build new buildings, make new discoveries, and much more
en.uni_arquebusier_description: Men armed with arquebuses, provide excellent offensive power
en.uni_archer_description: Archers can strike enemy troops from a safe distance and sap their morale
en.uni_artillery_description: A rain of fire upon our enemies
en.uni_avatar_fate_u_description: The Fate himself on the battlefield
en.uni_battle_angel_description: A holy fury on the battlefield
en.uni_bombard_description: Intense fire from many bombards can decimate enemy troops before the clash
en.uni_cannon_description: Field cannons will echo in the ears and nightmares of our enemies
en.uni_cataphract_description: The nobility of the Western Kingdom are heavily armed knights
en.uni_charmed_dweller_description: a villager with a blank stare
en.uni_demoness_description: Lady of black magic, she can bend any man to her will
en.uni_elf_warrior_description: The few remaining elves are formidable warriors
en.uni_harpy_description: Harpies bewitch humans with their song and devour wretches who get too close
en.uni_bandit_description: Poorly organized outlaws, are not a real danger
en.uni_behemoth_description: A behemoth of flesh and steel. The best that humans can deploy in the fight against evil
en.uni_canava_guard_description: Heavy armored mercenary troop, his two-handed sword will cause havoc in the enemy ranks
en.uni_cleric_description: Theresmore's elite religious troops, their large shields and armor effectively protecting them
en.uni_colonial_militia_description: New World Militia. Easily enlisted, they do their duty
en.uni_cpt_galliard_description: A symbol of hope, a beacon of light in a world darkened by evil
en.uni_commander_description: A true leader at the head of the army
en.uni_crossbowman_description: An improved version of the archer troops, can strike the enemy with precision and pierce armor
en.uni_cuirassier_description: Armed with heavy armor, sword and gun these powerful cavalry units will dominate the battlefield
en.uni_deserter_description: Once soldiers of a kingdom, now live by expediency. They have kept their excellent equipment
en.uni_familiar_description: Zenix Familiar are magical pets, they can scout pretty well
en.uni_fire_elemental_description: Its breath is fiery and leaves behind lava pools
en.uni_frost_elemental_description: The frost elemental generates an aura of ice around itself
en.uni_giant_snake_description: With its coils can crush a Theresmonian tricephalic ox
en.uni_giant_spider_description: With its immense web can capture even a griffon vulture
en.uni_goblin_marauder_description: Goblin raiders have low morale and flee easily
en.uni_goblin_warrior_description: Better armed than the marauders, they guard the goblin camps
en.uni_ghost_description: A damned spirit condemned to wander for eternity
en.uni_greater_demon_descriprion: A big demon spit out of hell
en.uni_jager_description: Outside these walls you will be our prey!
en.uni_hill_giant_description: Err in the barren hills with big trees as clubs
en.uni_line_infantry_description: Infantry armed with musket fighting in line
en.uni_knight_description: The elite feudal soldiers in Theresmore, strong in both offense and defense
en.uni_kobold_description: Kobolds are humanoid reptiles attracted to all that glitters. They often serve evil ancient dragons
en.uni_kobold_champion_description: Kobolds trained to fight for the King
en.uni_heavy_warrior_description: The best unit of the ancient era. Effective in both offense and defense
en.uni_imp_description: A mischievous and little flying demon capable of launching fireballs
en.uni_lesser_demon_description: One of the minor demons of the infernal hierarchy
en.uni_light_cavarly_description: Light cavalry, very effective against ranged units
en.uni_machine_gun_u_description: An inferno of magic bullets on our enemies
en.uni_mage_u_description: A glass cannon on the battlefield
en.uni_marksman_description: Elite ranged troops. Aim small, miss small
en.uni_man_at_arms_description: The direct evolution of heavy warriors but with armor and steel weapons
en.uni_mana_fortress_u_description: A stronghold of mana on the battlefield
en.uni_mercenary_veteran_description: Veterans in the pay of the highest bidder
en.uni_mountain_giant_description: His home is a large cave and has dozens of goblins who serve as his servants
en.uni_necromancer_description: A magician who worships the black arts, the undead are his servants
en.uni_naga_description: Naga snakes evolved with 4 arms, usually use them to wield 4 swords
en.uni_nikharul_soulstealer_description: The archlich Nikharul serve humanity, for now!
en.uni_ranger_description: With bow and sword, the forest has everything they need for their survival
en.uni_sacred_golem_description: A powerful stone warrior animated with magic
en.uni_scout_description: The Recon Squad is our family
en.uni_skeleton_description: A heap of bones that moves and wields a weapon
en.uni_spearman_description: The cheap front line of any deployment. It has a good defense
en.uni_spider_description: A multitude of small poisonous spiders
en.uni_smuggler_description: From the slums of the city know how to survive
en.uni_strategist_description: Are a master of both battle tactics and spells from behind lines
en.uni_steel_rider_description: A knight covered entirely in steel on a modified war stallion
en.uni_rifleman_u_description: The new front line of humanity
en.uni_phalanx_description: A wall of hoplites to counter the enemy
en.uni_priest_description: In the rear to encourage and bless the soldiers
en.uni_vaelgoroth_u_description: The great wyrm, thought to have fled into the depths of the world, had not vanished in retreat but had been summoned
en.uni_warrior_description: Simple unit of the ancient era
en.uni_white_company_description: Elite mercenary archers armed with longbow
en.uni_wind_elemental_description: A tornado of air with sharp blades
en.uni_tamed_djinn_description: The Djinn has been tamed and is ready to fight for us
en.uni_trebuchet_description: With the evolution of ballistics, we can deploy trebuchets. They have a very good offense
en.uni_troll_cave_description: Big and dumb, live in caves that they occupy as their dens. Their huge clubs can crush a man with a single blow
en.uni_zombie_description: Slow and putrefying, can contaminate vast areas with their disease
